description.en: The course provides an overview of photography in literature as well as a theoretical framework and practical experience for its analysis. In lectures and seminars the focus is on various forms in which photography manifests itself in text. Students learn about the representations and functions of physical photographs and descriptions of photographs in text, including those of real authentic photographs and real fictive photographs, also, the role of descriptions of real and fictive photographs in literature, relationships between physical photographs and descriptions of photographs in the same text, and, in addition, relationships between photography and the composition of a work, as well as between photography and the main concerns of a work.
description.et: Kursus annab ülevaate fotograafiast kirjandusteostes ning teoreetilise raamistiku ja praktilise kogemuse selle analüüsimiseks. Loengutes ja seminarides keskendutakse fotograafia erinevatele avaldumisvormidele tekstis. Õpitakse tundma füüsiliste fotode ja tekstis kirjeldatud fotode, sealhulgas tegelike autentsete fotode ja tegelike fiktiivsete fotode esitusviise ja funktsioone, samuti tegelike ja fiktiivsete fotode kirjelduste rolli kirjandusteostes, samas teoses olevate füüsiliste fotode ja tekstis kirjeldatud fotode vahekorda, aga ka seoseid fotograafia ja teose kompositsiooni ning fotograafia ja teose peamiste küsimuste vahel.

objectives.en: To deal with the forms of appearance and functions of photography in literary works, provide a brief overview of the history of the use of photography, a theoretical background to be able to recognise and understand obvious and more hidden functions of photography as well as analyse in detail various uses of photography in different works in order to understand the purposes that they serve
objectives.et: Käsitleda fotograafia esinemisvorme ja funktsioone kirjandusteostes, anda lühiülevaade fotode kasutamise ajaloost, teoreetiline taust fotograafia ilmsete ja varjatumate funktsioonide äratundmiseks ja mõistmiseks ning analüüsida üksikasjalikult mitmesuguseid fotograafia kasutamise viise erinevates teostes, et mõista, mis eesmärke need täidavad.

learning_outcomes.en: On completion of the course the student understands the multifaceted role of photography in literature as well as knows and can analyse its main uses on the basis of the examples dealt with during the course. The course broadens the student's understanding of the relationships between word and image both in literature and culture at large.
learning_outcomes.et: Kursuse lõpuks mõistab üliõpilane fotograafia mitmetahulist rolli kirjandusteostes ning tunneb ja oskab analüüsida selle kasutamise peamisi viise kursusel käsitletavate näidete põhjal.  Kursus avardab üliõpilase arusaama sõna ja kujutise vahelistest seostest nii kirjandusteostes kui ka kultuuris laiemalt

independent_work.et: Working on the assigned theoretical texts as well as extracts from literary texts accompanied by critical articles. Writing a course essay. (All the guidelines are provided in the Moodle, in the weekly homework files and the course outline).
